TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Kalokapuk, title = Kalokapuk, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kalokapuk} }

S.FORM: alang Kalokapuk ga niya mki sku Tayto Keng atu Ikekami go, kwara sali buwan nya ga 259 buwan, 715 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 41% kyan ku 296 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 59% kyan ku 419 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Amis 39%, Bunun 1%, Puyuma 1%. rhzyal kki'an tay mkraya' na Kalokapuk hya' ga Ciataw. tay 'zil na Kalokapuk hya' ga Fangafangasan. rekisi kayal kyokay qalang Kalokapuk ga ungat kyokay. ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan qalang Kalokapuk ga ungat pqwasan biru. khu skwan biru maki 1 khu skwan biru. tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh

alang Kalokapok ga niya mki sko Tayto Keng ato Ikekami go, kwara sali bowan nya ga 259 bowan, 715 hi ko kwara s'oli tayan. s'oli tayan pinspngan Gyencomin ga 41% kyan ko 296 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahon sko pinspngan Gyencomin ga 59% kyan ko 419 hi nya. pinspong na linhoyan Gyencomin ga, Amis 39%, Bonon 1%, Poyoma 1%. rhzyal kki'an tay mkraya' na Kalokapok hya' ga Ciataw. tay 'zil na Kalokapok hya' ga Fangafangasan. rekisi kayal kyokay qalang Kalokapok ga ongat kyokay. ssqoliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan qalang Kalokapok ga ongat pqwasan biro. kho skwan biro maki 1 kho skwan biro. toqi 'san baso kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbaho Uboy qqmayh
